## Applies To ##
* Ruby
## Problem Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby if ARGV.length == 0 puts "Usage: #{$0} [lines]" exit end
cmdname = "/usr/bin/tail" cmd = "#{cmdname} -#{ARGV[0]} /etc/passwd" system(cmd) ~~~~
## Solution Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby if ARGV.length <= 1 puts "Usage: #{$0} [lines] [text]" exit end
IO.popen(['/usr/bin/tail',"-"+ARGV[0]], 'r+') {|pipe| # Provide input to stdin 1.upto(100) { |i| pipe << i.to_s + " - " + ARGV[1] + "\n" } pipe.close_write # Redirect stdout to file output = pipe.read File.open('output_file', 'w') { |f| f.write(output) } } ~~~~
